variations.description: Generates a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 24% of max Health and redirects all damage dealt to allies to herself within the next 10 seconds instead, during which Physical DEF and Magic DEF are increased by 54%, and for the first 2 seconds, immune to all damages.

Generates a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 28% of max Health and redirects all damage dealt to allies to herself within the next 10 seconds instead, during which Physical DEF and Magic DEF are increased by 63%, and for the first 2 seconds, immune to all damages.

Generates a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 32% of max Health and redirects all damage dealt to allies to herself within the next 10 seconds instead, during which Physical DEF and Magic DEF are increased by 72%, and for the first 2 seconds, immune to all damages.

Generates a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 36% of max Health and redirects all damage dealt to allies to herself within the next 10 seconds instead, during which Physical DEF and Magic DEF are increased by 81%, and for the first 2 seconds, immune to all damages.

Generates a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 40% of max Health and redirects all damage dealt to allies to herself within the next 10 seconds instead, during which Physical DEF and Magic DEF are increased by 90%, and for the first 2 seconds, immune to all damages.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 300% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 40% of Afallen's Magic DEF for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 350% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 40% of Afallen's Magic DEF for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 400% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 40% of Afallen's Magic DEF for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 450% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 40% of Afallen's Magic DEF for 10s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 500% of ATK to all enemies, dispels their buffs, and reduces their Magic DEF by 40% of Afallen's Magic DEF for 10s.
Auto casts Holy Radiance once after taking damage 15 times.
Auto casts Holy Radiance once after taking damage 8 times.
